basic-form.label: Basic form
basic-form.hint: An example of a simple form produced using the HOF framework. This form showcases components and features available in the HOF framework.

complex-form.label: Complex form
complex-form.hint: An example of a form produced using the HOF framework. This form showcases more advanced features available in the HOF framework.

build-your-own-form.label: Build your own form
build-your-own-form.hint: Link to the HOF documentation, with instructions on how to build your own HOF form.

incomeTypes.label: Sources of income
incomeTypes.legend: Select the options where you receive income from
incomeTypes.hint: Select all options that apply to you.

phone.label: Phone number
phone.hint: International phone numbers require the international dialling code, for example +33235066182

countrySelect.label: Select a country
countrySelect.hint: Start to type the country name and options will appear
